links: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A000040(n+10) - A000040(n). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 14 2014
prog: (MAGMA) [NthPrime(n+10)-NthPrime(n): n in [1..100] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2011(Haskell)a031172 n = a031172_list !! (n-1)a031172_list = zipWith (-) (drop 10 a000040_list) a000040_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 23 2015
author: _Jeff Burch_
extensions: Offset changed from 2 to 1; added a(1)=29 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2011
